column2: Digital Turbine, Inc. engages in the innovation of media and mobile communications which helps to deliver an end-to-end platform solution for mobile operators, application developers, device original equipment manufacturers (OEM), and other third parties. The company is headquartered in Austin, Texas and currently employs 158 full-time employees. The firm operates through one operating segment, Advertising. The Advertising segment consists of the Operator and OEM (O&O) business. The O&O business is an advertiser solution for carrier and OEM inventory consisting of services, such as Ignite, a mobile device management platform and Discover, an intelligent application discovery platform.
